column1: Rú is a Quenya name for the Drúedain. The Drúedain called their own kind Drúedain
column2: a name which the Elves rendered into their own languages and intonations. In Sindarin it became Drû
column3: from which the name Drúedain has been derived. In Quenya
column4: Drughu became Rú.  When they were recognised by the Elves as belonging to the race of Men
column5: and became their allies in the war against Morgoth
column7: so Quenya Rúatani is exactly equivalent to Sindarin Drúedain.
